snippet: As an investigation into officers of Brooklyn’s 67th Precinct is nearing its end, those being investigated remain suspicious of planting guns, as defense lawyers had suggested.
abstract: Gun possession indictment against John Hooper is vacated, latest case to be dismissed in ongoing investigation into gun arrests by several police officers in Brooklyn's 67th precinct; Hooper files federal civil rights lawsuit against officers Gregory Jean-Baptiste and Edward Babington and New York City.
lead_paragraph: As an investigation into officers of Brooklyn’s 67th Precinct is nearing its end, those being investigated remain suspicious of planting guns, as defense lawyers had suggested.

headline.main: Another Case Tied to Brooklyn Officers in Gun-Planting Inquiry Is Dropped
headline.print_headline: Another Case Linked to Brooklyn Police Officers in Gun-Arrest Inquiry Is Dropped
